data.name: Tendryll
data.detailed_description:
Choose a party of two characters and build unique decks to defeat realms of befouled creatures in this tactical roguelike game.

Features

  • Positional Combat: Card-based movement influences all decisions on the battlefield. Deliver positional attacks and use terrain features to your advantage. Watch your step, as ground ruptures can modify your cards.
  • Empower Your Duo: Discover class-specific cards that can strengthen the character or your party. Equip relics strategically on your chosen characters to create powerful archetypes.
  • A Fluctuating World: Make challenging choices between corrupted battlefields that affect enemy traits.

data.short_description: Choose a party of two characters and build unique decks to defeat realms of befouled creatures in this tactical roguelike game. Coming soon.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 3.3
